GeneralInformation.Description: Unanchored and installed per manufacturer's recommendations on a carpeted floor.
GeneralInformation.Author: Not Given
GeneralInformation.Notes: This component requires user specified cost and time consequence data.  Values within PACT are defaults (equal to zero) and do not represent actual consequence.

DamageStates.Description: Wall units need to be adjusted and straightened.  Some elements are bent / damaged and need to be replaced.
DamageStates.RepairMeasures: Adjust and or straightened wall units.  Replace damaged units.  Assume a repair cost of 5% of the replacement value.
